title: murugA enavE dinam karudAmal
sahitya:
murugA enavE dinam karudAmal irAdE manamE paramAnandam uravE bhakti paravashattODu nI


anupallavi

  peruvAriyAga vandu darishikkum aDiyArai peru vAzhvumAru krpai kUruvOnai


caraNam    ati vEgamAga engum alaiyum tanmaiyAl mati kulaiya mayangi mAya valaiyil irangi nI
gati kalangi OyAda kavalaiyil tOyAdu idayam pUrittiDum vidamOr ArvattuDanE
